card.title: Welcome to encodeBiz SaaS
card.subtitle: Register, control and manage access in one place, PassBiz ready for you and soon CheckBiz.

cardDesc.subtitle1: At Encodebiz we create tailored solutions for unique needs.
cardDesc.subtitle2: If your company requires specialized development, we are ready to make it happen.

card.title: Create legal entity

salesPlan.title: AVAILABLE PLANS
salesPlan.subTitle: Choose between the Free, Bronze, or Enterprise version based on the features you need. Upgrade or change your plan at any time to enhance your experience with PassBiz.

salesPlan.costEstimated: Estimated cost: Variable based on usage

card1.text2: A platform created to centralize all your digital services in one place.
card1.text3: At encodeBiz we turn your ideas into digital solutions. When our services don't cover all your needs, we create what your business requires, tailored to you.

card2.text2: Before choosing a service and plan, we recommend completing the configuration of your entity.

card3.text9: Create and manage events with passes for attendees and staff.

card3.text12: Record entries and exits with geolocation
card3.text13: , organize teams and projects, and generate real-time reports.
